content.text: Okame was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi and Koza.

She is a skinny woman with red makeup on her cheeks and short black hair. She wears a long pink dress, that has purple stripes around the waist, and the kanji 砂, meaning sand. She wears a white hat, and carries a large sword on her back.
Okame was a quiet girl, that never spoke much.
Okame is also seen holding a sword, though it is not known how skilled she is with it.
She and the other children managed to protect Vivi from Agotogi and his gang of thugs.
Years later, she became a member of the Rebel Army led by Koza.

elements.text: Her name most likely comes from the Okame mask of Japan.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 19 Chapter 167 and Episode 105, Okame makes her debut.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 76), Okame's name is revealed.
